r.t: Start of Block: Default Question Block
1 FIRE_CHECK_1 - In the last working week, did you perform any of the following activities as a firefighter?
FIRE_1B Search and rescue, including motor vehicle accidents (2)
FIRE_1D Overhaul, clean up, and/or sifting through the remains of a fire (4)
FIRE_1E Firebreak constructing, controlled burning or preventative burning (5)
FIRE_1F Support, education, prevention, communications, or management activities (6)
1A1 FIRE_CHECK_1A1 - In the last working week, did you fight any of the following fire types?
FIRE_1A1C Industrial fires or fires that involved hazardous materials (3)
1A2 FIRE_RADIO_1A2 - In the last working week, did you wear an air-supplied breathing apparatus during frontline firefighting?
If 1 = FIRE_1D Overhaul, clean up, and/or sifting through the remains of a fire
1D1 FIRE_RADIO_1D1 - In the last working week, did you wear an air-supplied breathing apparatus during overhaul or clean up?
If 1 = FIRE_1E Firebreak constructing, controlled burning or preventative burning
1E1 FIRE_RADIO_1E1 - In the last working week, did you wear an air-supplied breathing apparatus when constructing a firebreak, doing preventative burning or controlled burning?

RADIO_2_1 - In the last working week, did you use or repair any fuel-powered equipment other than vehicles or generators (e.g., concrete cutter, metal cutter, truck mount, chainsaws, lawnmowers, concrete mixer, brush cutter)?
CHECK_2_1A1 - What type of fuel was used in the equipment (other than vehicles) you used or repaired?
aFPE_1A1C Propane or Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) (3)
RADIO_2_1A2 - Were you indoors when you were using or repairing the equipment?
CHECK_2_1A2A1 - How was the area where you worked ventilated?
aFPE_1A2A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aFPE_1A2A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aFPE_1A2A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aFPE_1A2A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aFPE_1A2A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aFPE_1A2A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
RADIO_2_1A3 - In the last working week, did you refuel the equipment?
RADIO_3_1 - In the last working week, did you chop, cut, saw, sand or otherwise work with wood?
RADIO_3_1A1 - In the last working week, did you use power tools to work with wood?
RADIO_3_1A2 - In the last working week, did you work with plywood, particle board, marine ply or MDF board?
CHECK_3_1A4 - In the last working week, did you work indoors or outdoors?
CHECK_3_1A4A1 - Was there a ventilation system that removed dust or fume from where you worked in the last working week (local exhaust ventilation or on-tool extraction)?
RADIO_3_1A5 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection when working with wood?
CHECK_3_1A5A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
aCTW_1A5A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
aCTW_1A5A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
aCTW_1A5A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP) (4)
CHECK_3_1A6 - How was the working area cleaned of dust?
aCTW_1A6B Using vacuum cleaner fitted with a HEPA filter (2)
aCTW_1A6D Using a brush or sweeping the area with a broom (4)
aCTW_1A6E Mopping the area with water (5)
aCTW_1A6G The working area was not cleaned of dust (7)
RADIO_3_1A7 - In the last working week, was water spray or water suppression used to reduce the amount of dust in your work area?
RADIO_4_1 - In the last working week, did you use cutting or cooling oils?
CHECK_4_1A1 - What types of cutting or cooling oils did you use? (May also be referred to as lubricating or machine oils or fluids.)
aCTO_1A1A Straight cutting oils (clear and feels oily) (1)
aCTO_1A1B Soluble cutting oils (milky white and feels watery) (2)
aCTO_1A1C Semi-synthetic cutting oils (forms a semi-transparent fluid when mixed with water) (3)
aCTO_1A1D Synthetic oils which are water soluble (forms a clear fluid when mixed with water) (4)
CHECK_4_1A2 - In the last working week, did you use cutting or cooling oils with hand tools or with a fixed machine?
RADIO_4_1A2B1 - In the last working week, did you use an enclosed machine (you had to open a door on the machine to see the machining fluid)?
RADIO_4_1A2B1B1 - Did you allow time for the mist or droplets to settle before opening the machine?
RADIO_5_1 - In the last working week, did you drive, maintain, or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
CHECK_5_1A1 - What types of fuel did the vehicles that you drove, maintained or travelled in use?
aDVM_1A1C Liquified Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane (3)
RADIO_5_1A2 - In the last working week, did you fuel the vehicles yourself?
RADIO_5_1A3 - In the last working week, did you drive or travel in vehicles as part of your work?
CHECK_5_1A3A1 - What types of roads or areas did you drive or travel on?
aDVM_1A3A1A Any public street or road in an urban area (1)
aDVM_1A3A1B National, regional, district or municipal roads outside an urban area (including motorways) (2)
aDVM_1A3A1F Surface driving in an open mine or in a quarry (6)
RADIO_5_1A4 - In the last working week, did you perform any maintenance work on vehicles?
RADIO_5_1A4A1 - In the last working week, did you do tune ups, exhaust pipe work, or engine overhauls on the vehicles?
RADIO_5_1A4A1A1 - In the last working week, did you attach a hose to the exhaust pipe of the vehicle you maintained to lead the exhaust fumes outside?
RADIO_5_1A4A2 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches?
RADIO_5_1A4A2A1 - In the last working week, did you service/repair/replace brakes or clutches on vehicles older than [DE: 2005, FI: 1993; FR: 1997; IE: 2000; ES: 2002 ; HU: 2005]?
RADIO_5_1A4A4 - In the last working week, did you drain fuel tanks or change fuel filters?
CHECK_5_1A4A5 - In the last working week, did you work indoors or outdoors?
CHECK_5_1A4A5A1 - How was the area where you carried out vehicle maintenance ventilated?
aDVM_1A4A5A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aDVM_1A4A5A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust and fumes away from your face (2)
aDVM_1A4A5A1C By a general ventilation system (3)
aDVM_1A4A5A1D By fans in the window or doorway (4)
aDVM_1A4A5A1E By open doors or windows (5)
aDVM_1A4A5A1F No ventilation was applied to the area (6)
RADIO_6_1 - In the last working week, did you work in an area where there were vehicles driven or had their engines running?
CHECK_6_1A1 - What types of fuel were used in these vehicles?
aVEX_1A1C Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane (3)
CHECK_6_1A2 - Were these vehicles indoors or outdoors?
CHECK_6_1A2A1 - How was the area ventilated?
aVEX_1A2A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the vapour, dust, fume at the emission point (1)
aVEX_1A2A1B By a general ventilation system (2)
aVEX_1A2A1C By fans in the window or doorway (3)
aVEX_1A2A1D By open doors or windows (4)
aVEX_1A2A1E No ventilation was applied to the area (5)

RADIO_6_1A4 - In the last working week, did you smell exhaust from the vehicles?
RADIO_7_1 - In the last working week, did you work with any asbestos-containing materials?
RADIO_7_1A1 - What type of work did you do involving asbestos-containing material?
aASR_1A1A Repair or maintenance tasks (not involving removal of asbestos-containing materials) (1)
1A1A Repair or maintenance tasks (not involving removal of asbestos-containing materials)
CHECK_7_1A1A1 - Which materials did you work with?
aASR_1A1A1C Gaskets that could contain asbestos (3)
1A1A Repair or maintenance tasks (not involving removal of asbestos-containing materials)
RADIO_7_1A1A2 - Did you cut, grind or break up the asbestos-containing material or were you exposed to it by accident?
1A1A Repair or maintenance tasks (not involving removal of asbestos-containing materials)
RADIO_7_1A1A3 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection?
CHECK_7_1A1A3A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?
aASR_1A1A3A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge (1)
aASR_1A1A3A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
aASR_1A1A3A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP) (4)
1A1A Repair or maintenance tasks (not involving removal of asbestos-containing materials)
CHECK_7_1A1A4 - How did you clean up the dust in the last working week?
aASR_1A1A4B Using vacuum cleaner fitted with a HEPA filter (2)
aASR_1A1A4D Using a brush or sweeping the area with a broom (4)
aASR_1A1A4E Mopping the area with water (5)
aASR_1A1A4G The working area was not cleaned of dust (7)
CHECK_7_1A1B1 - Which of the following asbestos-containing materials did you remove?
aASR_1A1B1A Fibro (fibrous cement) sheet (external cladding, roofing, pipes, internal wet-area lining sheets) (1)
aASR_1A1B1B Asbestos cavity insulation (from wall or ceiling cavities in buildings) (2)
aASR_1A1B1C Fire rated board or millboard (3)
aASR_1A1B1E Any asbestos-containing material from onboard a ship, train or other mobile plant (5)
aASR_1A1B1F Lagging/insulation from boilers/ovens/furnaces or similar fixed plant (6)
aASR_1A1B1H Road paving or asphalt containing asbestos (8)
CHECK_7_1A1B2 - In the last working week, did you use any of the following methods to remove the asbestos containing materials?
aASR_1A1B2B Saturation and water injection method (2)
aASR_1A1B2D Hammering or using power tools (e.g. disc cutters, saws, etc) (4)
RADIO_7_1A1B3 - In the last working week, was the asbestos removal work done inside an enclosure?
RADIO_7_1A1B3A1 - Was the enclosure under negative pressure?
RADIO_7_1A1B3A1A1 - Did you do a preliminary decontamination of personal protective equipment (PPE) before leaving the enclosure?
RADIO_7_1A1B4 - In the last working week, was there a decontamination unit (DCU) on site so that you could shower and decontaminate fully?
CHECK_7_1A1B5 - In the last working week, what protective clothing did you wear when removing asbestos-containing materials?
RADIO_7_1A1B6 - Did you shower before or after removing PPE?
RADIO_7_1A1B7 - In the last working week, what was the last item of PPE you removed following work?
RADIO_7_1A1B8 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protective equipment when removing the asbestos containing materials?
CHECK_7_1A1B8A1 - What type of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use when removing the asbestos-containing materials in the last working week?
aASR_1A1B8A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle filter (P3) or a cartridge (1)
aASR_1A1B8A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus) (3)
aASR_1A1B8A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (FFP3 type) (4)
RADIO_8_1 - In the last working week, did you work outside during the day (includes being in a vehicle that is outside)?

1A3A Under partial shade (e.g., sun shade sail, under trees)

1A3A Under partial shade (e.g., sun shade sail, under trees)

1A3A Under partial shade (e.g., sun shade sail, under trees)

RADIO_8_1A3B4 - In the last working week, did you wear a hat or other sun protection head cover when working out in the open?
RADIO_8_1A3C1 - In the last working week, did you have your windows open in the vehicle you were working in?

RADIO_9_1 - In the last working week, did you clean your hands with anything other than water, soap, detergent, or antibacterial gel/spray at work?
